verses.text:
O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild,
Thy Father's will Thou hast fulfilled;
For Thou hast left Thy heavenly throne,
O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild.

O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild,
With joy Thou hast the whole world filled;
Thou comest down from heaven's pure fire,
O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild.

O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild,
Thou art love's image undefiled.
Inflame our hearts with Thy love's fire,
O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild.

O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild,
Help us to do as Thou hast willed.
What'er we have be Thine own,
O Jesus sweet, O Jesus mild.
